protein.general_function: Involved in G-protein coupled receptor protein signaling pathway
protein.specific_function: Receptor for all-trans- and 11-cis-retinal. Binds preferentially to the former and may catalyze the isomerization of the chromophore by a retinochrome-like mechanism

go_class.description: cell surface receptor linked signaling pathway
g-protein coupled receptor protein signaling pathway

reference.reference_text: Shen D, Jiang M, Hao W, Tao L, Salazar M, Fong HK: A human opsin-related gene that encodes a retinaldehyde-binding protein. Biochemistry. 1994 Nov 8;33(44):13117-25.
